title: Strike Witches Movie (Strike Witches: The Movie)
synopsis: After fending off the threat of a Neuroi invasion of Romagna and destroying the enemy's nest over Venezia, Yoshika Miyafuji goes back to her home town in the Empire of Fusou. Despite the loss of her magical and healing abilities, the former officer of the 501st Joint Fighter Wing wants to continue studying medicine. This is in order to help those in need, both civilians and those on the front lines alike. She receives an invitation from a prestigious school in Europe and decides to accept the offer, embarking on a journey back to the war-torn continent.
related_anime: ['Strike Witches Gekijouban: 501 Butai Hasshin shimasu!', 'Strike Witches: Road to Berlin', 'Strike Witches: Operation Victory Arrow', 'Strike Witches Gekijouban: Kaeritai Basho']
